short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display corresponding hiragana characters above kanji on FluentU

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that scans 'Japanese learning pages' on FluentU for kanji and displays the corresponding hiragana above them.

The hiragana is already provided by FluentU, but it is hidden by default. This extension makes sure it is displayed when a word contains kanji.
